properties.areaDesc: Inner waters from Point Mugu to San Mateo Pt. CA including Santa Catalina and Anacapa Islands
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 6 at 9:03AM PST until January 6 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Los Angeles/Oxnard CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Hazardous sea conditions.

* WHERE...Inner waters from Point Mugu to San Mateo Pt. CA
including Santa Catalina and Anacapa Islands.

* WHEN...Until noon PST today.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...See the Coastal Waters Forecast (CWFLOX).
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... ...GALE WARNING IS CANCELLED
